Regulation Name(s): Blood gases (pCO2, pO2) and blood pH test system
Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of blood gases and pH
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GEM Premier 5000 analyzer for quantitative measurement of pH, pCO2, and pO2 in heparinized whole blood at the point of care or clinical laboratory.
Indications for Use Summary: Provides rapid quantitative measurements of pH and pO2 from venous, arterial, and capillary heparinized whole blood and pCO2 from venous and arterial heparinized whole blood to aid in diagnosis and treatment of life-threatening acid-base disturbances.
